Title: The new generation grows up in happiness
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: Photographs showing the improved conditions for Chinese youngsters growing up after Liberation. The series focusses on Shanghai. Here showing, amongst others, Mao Zedong giving flowers to a Pioneer on Tian'anmen Gate, Song Qingling reading with children, and the Shanghai Children's Palace.
